product_name: Injinji Outdoor NuWool Original Weight Crew Socks
long_description: The thin Injinji Outdoor Nuwool(TM) Original Weight Crew Socks are a boot-friendly length with minimal cushioning for a lightweight fit, and the individual toes sleeves help to prevent blisters. Individual anatomic toe sleeves form a thin anti-blister membrane between toes to eliminate skin-against-skin friction. Nuwool blend of merino wool, nylon and spandex wicks moisture to keep your feet dry when you're hiking. Injinji Outdoor Nuwool Original Weight Crew Socks have lightweight cushioning. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: The thin Injinji Outdoor Nuwool(TM) Original Weight Crew Socks are a boot-friendly length with minimal cushioning for a lightweight fit, and the individual toes sleeves help to prevent blisters.
